Package it.polimi.se2018.events.singleplayer

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EndSinglePlayerEvent
    Class EndSinglePlayerEvent: single player event that handle the end of the game in single payer mode
    NotMatchColorEvent
    Class NotMarchColorEvent: single player event that is used when the player selects a dice with a color that doesn't match with the color of the tool card he wants to use
    SinglePlayerEvent
    Class SinglePlayerEvent: model view event that indicates if the mode is single player
    SinglePlayerRequestEvent
    Class SinglePlayerRequestEvent: model view event that //todo adriano
    SinglePrivateEvent
    Class SinglePrivateEvent: single player event that deliveries the list of private cards
    StartToolSinglePlayerEvent
    Class StartToolSinglePlayerEvent: single player event that asks to the player if he wants to use the tool card in single player mode
    ToolCardSinglePlayerStartEvent
    Class ToolCardSinglePlayerStarEvent: single player event that allows to use a tool card
    ToolNumberEvent
    Class ToolNumberEvent: single player event that delivered tool cards as much as the difficulty chosen by player
    ToolNumberRequestEvent
    Class ToolNumberRequestEvent: single player event that asks to the player if he wants to use a tool card
